Was his name John?

--- On Thu, 9/18/08, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@li=
ve.com> wrote:

From: Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...>
Subject: [E=
VP-ITC] It gets weird form here!
To: "Group" <evp-itc@yahoogroups.com>
Date=
: Thursday, September 18, 2008, 11:43 AM






Hi all;
=A0
=A0I got a call,=
 actually my wife got the call since I was at work, from a guy claiming he =
got my phone number from a 'hack' box. It could have been fake, but--- I ha=
d on my dresser a portable tape deck with a session dated 08/03/08, and at =
the spot I stopped was this voice talking about 'John (or jon)' calling. An=
 example maybe of what I call "talk as if live", or voices on old tapes tal=
king about the present moment. Weeeeeird!
=A0
=A0This stuff never ceases to=
 amaze me. 
=A0
=A0F-S
